backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for payout methods and withdrawal requests with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD-style methods for users.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that initializes payout method and withdrawal request maps and counters on upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated source files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Provides build and deployment steps plus troubleshooting guidance for local and production environments.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Outlines all UI elements and states required for the crypto wallet dashboard and marks completed items.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app router, authentication gate, profile setup modal logic, and page route definitions.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Extends the backend interface with a method for initializing access control using a secret token.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin-only routes by checking admin status and showing loading or access denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Displays a login card with Internet Identity authentication and a loading state.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount, and status badge.
Shows a list of crypto transactions with filters, loading states, and real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Displays a styled header showing total crypto balance with a visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Provides a horizontal list of quick-action buttons like Send, Receive, Buy, Swap, and Send to Bank.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with icons, balances, and optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Bottom sheet for buying crypto, validating input, and creating a pending local transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Bottom sheet for selecting an asset, showing a mock receive address, copying it, and logging a placeholder transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Form sheet for sending crypto, handling asset selection, address input, amount entry, and creating a local pending transaction.
Multi‑step sheet for withdrawing funds to a bank, including amount entry, payout method selection or creation, and submission via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Sheet for swapping between two crypto assets with mock rate calculation and adding a pending local transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promo card showing a marketing message with an illustration fallback and pagination dots.
Clickable or disabled dashboard shortcut tile with icon, label, optional badge, and support for various sizes.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Row component displaying a gift card brand with fallback icon and click interaction.
Renders up to a limited number of label chips with a counter for remaining tags.
UI for adding, removing, and saving gift card labels with change detection and loading state.
Provides a UI popover for filtering gift cards by selectable tags with search and clear-all options.
Renders a table showing NGN gift card rate tiers for a given brand.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays an inline NGN rate summary or an unavailable notice for a matched tier.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet picker allowing users to search and select a gift card brand.
Defines the main application layout with navigation, side sheet menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Mobile bottom navigation dock providing quick access to key app sections with some items marked coming soon.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a new user profile with name and username input and async submission.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable tile component for selecting a bill payment category with icon and label.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Defines conversion rate and fee settings and provides a function to compute gross, fee, and net amounts.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Defines the GiftCardBrand interface and a catalog of gift card brands with search terms and icons, plus helpers for filtering and a generic icon path.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN gift card rate tiers, brand overrides, and utilities for selecting rate tables, matching tiers, and formatting rates.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Provides vendor configurations with rates and fees and includes logic to compute payouts and select the best vendor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, gift card, withdrawal, and transaction data into a unified dashboard state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Tracks per‑principal suppression of profile setup prompts using localStorage with helpers to suppress or unsuppress.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, gift cards, and withdrawals, currently returning placeholders due to unimplemented backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Fetches current user profile and extracts primary wallet balance and currency.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, utility layers, and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, currency formatting, and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin page for searching users and reviewing KYC submissions, wrapped in a route guard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin interface to review, approve, or reject pending withdrawals with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing wallet balance, shortcuts, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary logic.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Exports a helper that parses an amount and returns the matching NGN rate tier for a brand.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form to add a new gift card, including brand selection, rate display, and optional image upload.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays detailed gift card info, allows updating status, managing labels, and viewing applicable NGN rate tiers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Shows a filterable list of gift cards with tag-based filtering and navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Provides UI for selling a gift card, including vendor selection, rate matching, and conversion calculations.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Displays KYC status and form for submitting identity documents with upload handling.
Form for purchasing airtime, validating inputs, and logging a local transaction.
Placeholder betting top‑up form that logs a local transaction and displays a coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Landing page listing bill‑payment categories and navigating to their respective pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Form UI for logging placeholder cable TV bill payments and storing them as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Displays a mock crypto wallet dashboard with token balances, activity, and action sheets for sending, receiving, buying, swapping, and withdrawing crypto.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Form UI for logging placeholder mobile data purchases and saving them as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Form for placeholder electricity bill payments that records transactions locally.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: Form for logging placeholder WiFi or internet bill payments as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: Manages withdrawal requests and payout methods with forms, server mutations, and status displays.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Local storage utility for adding, retrieving, and clearing up to 50 locally saved transactions.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines TypeScript data models for users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC records, payout methods, and withdrawals used by the frontend.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for environment variables II_URL and II_DERIVATION_ORIGIN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters in both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, path aliases, env var shims, build chunking, dev proxying, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s feature list, new requests, metadata, and versioned state.
